pages.title: Ocean of Consciousness
pages.text: $(key)Ocean of Consciousness$() is a world of nothingness.$(br2)Entering permanently increases your $(mechanic/hostility)Hostility extra difficulty$() by $(bold)100$() levels.$(br2)You cannot use $(util/waystone)Waystones$() to enter or leave. The only way in is the $(key)Magic Mirror$(), and the only way out is the $(key)Consciousness Pivot$().

pages.title: Consciousness Pivot
pages.text: $(key)Consciousness Pivots$() are scattered across the ocean's surface. Right-click the $(key)Consciousness Core$() to $(bold)activate$() it and start an $(key)Invasion Event$(). Mobs attack in waves; clear them for special rewards.$(br2)Higher $(bold)Difficulty Factor$() makes invasions harder.

$(br)After an $(key)Invasion Event$() ends, the $(key)Consciousness Core$() will emit a beam of light. Stand in the beam to teleport back to the corresponding location in the Overworld.$(br2)An $(bold)activated$() $(key)Consciousness Pivot$() can also affect nearby $(util/storage#wireless)storage systems$(), acting similarly to a beacon.
